Comments_List: Strengths: Wonderful instructor, small class size, well paced homeworks.
Dr. Lichtman made this class.  It was just fantastic.  If you are interested in learning how to prepare a submittable grant, this is the class for you.
She's wonderful, approachable and willing to work with each student individually if necessary.
If you need to apply for a grant and actually get it, take this course. Strongly recommend
